mapper.select: SELECT dt.day_tour_id as dayTourId, dt.day_tour_id as id, dt.name, dt.location, dt.short_description as shortDescription, dt.overview_image as overviewImage, dt.description, dt.price, dt.duration, dt.rating, dt.image_url as imageUrl, dt.banner_image as bannerImage, dt.product_showcase_image as productShowcaseImage, dt.category, dt.is_active as isActive, dt.created_at as createdAt, dt.updated_at as updatedAt, dt.region_id as regionId, dt.departure_address as departureAddress, dt.guide_fee as guideFee, dt.guide_id as guideId, dt.cost_price as costPrice, dt.small_group_price_difference as smallGroupPriceDifference, r.name as regionName FROM day_tours dt LEFT JOIN regions r ON dt.region_id = r.region_id WHERE dt.day_tour_id = #{id}

SELECT dt.day_tour_id as id, dt.day_tour_id as dayTourId, dt.name, dt.description, dt.price, dt.duration, dt.location, dt.departure_address, dt.guide_fee, dt.rating, dt.region_id, dt.category, dt.image_url as coverImage, dt.banner_image as bannerImage, r.name as regionName FROM day_tours dt LEFT JOIN regions r ON dt.region_id = r.region_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT day_tour_id, AVG(rating) as avg_rating, COUNT(*) as review_count FROM reviews WHERE day_tour_id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY day_tour_id ) rv ON dt.day_tour_id = rv.day_tour_id WHERE dt.show_on_user_site = 1 AND dt.is_active = 1 ORDER BY rv.avg_rating DESC, rv.review_count DESC, dt.day_tour_id DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT dt.day_tour_id as id, dt.day_tour_id as dayTourId, dt.name, dt.description, dt.price, dt.duration, dt.location, dt.departure_address, dt.guide_fee, dt.rating, dt.region_id, dt.category, dt.image_url as coverImage, dt.banner_image as bannerImage, r.name as regionName FROM day_tours dt LEFT JOIN regions r ON dt.region_id = r.region_id WHERE dt.show_on_user_site = 1 AND dt.is_active = 1 ORDER BY dt.day_tour_id DESC LIMIT #{limit}
